alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pasco, northeastern Manatee, Hillsborough and west central Polk Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hillsborough River State Park to 6 miles south of Fish Hawk to near Ellenton. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Bradenton, Plant City, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Ellenton, Hillsborough River State Park, Greater Sun Center, Zephyrhills South, Memphis, Zephyrhills West, Zephyrhills North, Riverview, Ruskin, Parrish, Wesley Chapel South and Palm River-Clair Mel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Inland Pasco; Polk
